channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Coping With Marriage Problems Via Generative AI
item.description: Marriages are bound to encounter difficulties. Making use of marriage counselors can be helpful. Another option is generative AI provided guidance. He...

item.title: Crypto Security Warning: Trust Wallet Confirms $7 Million Chrome Hack
item.description: Compromised Google Chrome browser Trust Wallet extension stole $7 million in crypto, Binance founder Changpeng Zhao has confirmed.

item.title: Jeffrey R. Holland, next in line to lead Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, dies at 85
item.description: Holland died early Saturday morning from complications associated with kidney disease, the church announced on its website.

item.description: One of the toughest yet most rewarding annual display of "shooting stars" peaks overnight on Jan. 3-4, 2026 — here’s how to catch the Quadrantid meteo...

item.title: Bolsonaro undergoes medical procedure to treat severe hiccups
item.description: Bolsonaro is currently in prison after being convicted by the Supreme Court of attempting to carry out a coup following his electoral defeat in 2022.

item.title: Brutal year for stock picking spurs trillion-dollar fund exodus
item.description: Around $1 trillion was pulled from active equity mutual funds over the year, according to estimates from Bloomberg Intelligence using ICI data.

item.description: The FBI is investigating the theft of a $400,000 lobster delivery bound for Costco locations in Illinois and Minnesota that was allegedly hijacked.

item.title: Holiday barks sold at Aldi recalled over potential undeclared pecans, wheat: FDA
item.description: Silvestri Sweets recalled Choceur-branded holiday bark sold at Aldi stores after a packaging mix-up led to undeclared allergens in the popular treats.

item.title: Where you can shop for your last-minute Christmas needs
item.description: Need last-minute holiday essentials? Find out which major retailers like Target have modified hours on Christmas Eve and will close for the holiday.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
